name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (SELECT count(1) from hr_job_platform_account where Job_platform_id = t1.id )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: PLATFORM_ACCOUNT_COUNT

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`CREATE_DATE`,
t1.`CREATE_UID`,
t1.`EMAIL`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`IMAGE`,
t1.`NAME`,
(SELECT count(1) from hr_job_platform_account where Job_platform_id = t1.id ) AS `PLATFORM_ACCOUNT_COUNT`,
t1.`TYPE`,
t1.`URL`,
t1.`WRITE_DATE`,
t1.`WRITE_UID`
FROM `hr_job_platform` t1
